built_in_tools.name: codebase_search
built_in_tools.description: Semantic search tool to find code snippets and documentation most relevant to search queries across the codebase

built_in_tools.name: read_file
built_in_tools.description: Read file contents with line range specification, useful for examining existing code, configs, and documentation

built_in_tools.name: edit_file
built_in_tools.description: Create new files or edit existing files with precise code changes and context-aware modifications

built_in_tools.name: run_terminal_cmd
built_in_tools.description: Execute terminal commands for building, testing, installing dependencies, and running scripts

built_in_tools.name: list_dir
built_in_tools.description: List directory contents to understand file structure and discover relevant files

built_in_tools.name: grep_search
built_in_tools.description: Fast regex-based text search using ripgrep for finding exact patterns in files

built_in_tools.name: file_search
built_in_tools.description: Fuzzy file path search to locate files when you know partial names or paths

built_in_tools.name: web_search
built_in_tools.description: Search the web for real-time information about technologies, APIs, and current best practices

mcp_tools.name: context7_resolve_library
mcp_tools.description: Resolve package/library names to Context7-compatible IDs for documentation lookup

mcp_tools.name: context7_get_docs
mcp_tools.description: Fetch comprehensive up-to-date documentation for libraries and frameworks

user_resources.name: tanuki_architecture_doc
user_resources.description: Comprehensive 521-line architecture document detailing the Tanuki-Programmer MoA system with 127 agents, training approach, and implementation plan
